Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Delicately \Del"i*cate*ly\ (d[e^]l"[i^]*k[asl]t*l[y^]), adv. In a delicate manner. [1913 Webster]
delicately adv : in a delicate manner; "finely shaped features"; "her fine drawn body" [syn: {finely}, {fine}, {exquisitely}]
